text: HubSpot experts, quick question: does Smart content only work for rich text modules? Not for custom modules, such as background images, etc?

(just got back in-office and getting caught up from holiday)
-------
Welcome <@UEZGAHP4H>! Hope you had a great new years and welcome to the HubSpot community! We're excited to have you. Let us know if you have any questions about getting going with local dev <#CBZK16L9L|ftp-feedback> is a great place to ask questions. Also, you may find this helpful: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Can-you-setup-local-development-on-HubSpot-CMS/td-p/199430>

Thanks for the responses to Dustin's original question, John! :slightly_smiling_face: :raised_hands:

cc <@UF87TDMQE> - does this answer your question? You could also check out:
> - <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/add-smart-content-to-your-website-pages-landing-pages-and-emails>

thanks for the first response Dennis
Amazing!! Thanks so much!!! I will look into smart module! This made my day :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey good morning everyone. Is there any tutorial to add custom modules to hubl local server?
Not to my knowledge, but I know HubSpot devs are working hard to improve the local development setup so I imagine we can expect tutorials out the wazoo at some point
